"Spork-" - a social media platform for food enthusiasts to share recipes, cooking tips, and restaurant recommendations.
"Spoonful of" - a subscription box that delivers a monthly selection of gourmet and artisanal spoon designs from around the world.
"Spoon-i-" - a mobile app that uses augmented reality to turn any ordinary spoon into a virtual reality experience.
"Spoon-tacular" - a culinary festival that brings together chefs, foodies, and spoon enthusiasts to celebrate the art and science of spoon design.
"Spoon-i-fy" - a DIY kit that allows users to customize and personalize their own spoon designs using various materials and techniques.
